name: Otto
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lights”
”Alexa, decrease the house temperature by 2 degrees”
”Alexa, lock the front door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Smart Home for the rest of us.

This is home automation for how you really live. By using your homes blueprint we program otto to understand the home inside and out, on a structural level. This is not an add-on feature—otto is deeply integrated into your new home’s operational DNA. Always monitoring, always learning, always ready to grow and improve, otto is the heart and the brain of the truly automated home. This blueprint level integration allows us to do things to secure and reduce energy that are impossible with off the shelf “smart” home products. Nothing else even comes close. Otto brings everything together in one elegant home interface and one easy app. Otto learns and adapts. Otto protects your home. Otto saves you money.
